thread.title: 'Ok Google' detection removed from Chrome for Windows, Mac and Linux
thread.title_full: 'Ok Google' detection removed from Chrome for Windows, Mac and Linux

title: 'Ok Google' detection removed from Chrome for Windows, Mac and Linux
text:
'Ok Google' detection removed from Chrome for Windows, Mac and Linux 
Published By: AndroidCentral.com - Today 
With the latest stable release of Chrome, version 46, Google has removed the always-listening feature that let users simply say "OkT Google"...
